headline: Tesla faces Justice Department probe of range claim
summary: The Justice Department is investigating whether Tesla cars can live up to what the EPA’s official estimates of how far they can go on a single charge.

headline: Is GM Set for 14th Straight EPS Beat in Q4? How to Play the Stock Now
summary: GM heads into Q4 earnings with rising estimates, a 13-quarter EPS beat streak and valuation upside, even as U.S. deliveries and EV sales cooled in the quarter.

headline: Ford Motor Company Announces Details for Q4, Full-Year 2025 Earnings Conference Call
summary: DEARBORN, Mich., January 22, 2026--Ford Motor Company and Ford Motor Credit Company will release fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 financial results at 4:05 p.m. ET on Tuesday, Feb. 10.

headline: Stellantis CEO says turnaround plan includes new Jeeps, Ram trucks, and return of the Hemi V8
summary: Stellantis CEO Antonio Filosa projected an upbeat tone from the floor of the Detroit Auto Show. This despite the fact that the relatively new CEO has much on his plate.

headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights Tesla, Ford and General Motors
summary: Tesla heads into Q4 earnings with falling deliveries, shrinking margins and rising competition, prompting caution ahead of its Jan. 28 report.

headline: Ford’s Shift From EVs to Hybrids and Gas Models Might Change The Case For Investing In Ford (F)
summary: In recent months, Ford Motor has reported its best fourth quarter and annual sales since 2019, outpacing the broader auto industry for 10 consecutive months while shifting its U.S. product focus toward gasoline and hybrid vehicles and away from loss-making electric models such as the F-150 Lightning. At the same time, Ford is working to sharpen its brand and operations, from repositioning Lincoln’s headquarters in Detroit to quality-related recalls and dealer-focused digital investments,...
